description:
Jin and Izayoi make a side bet on the upcoming gift game that could affect the future of the No-Name community.  In their first gift game, the rules weren’t agreed upon beforehand stacking the odds against them. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il paraît qu`ils font des choses dans la salle de bains ?
Ofuro de Anna Koto ya Konna Koto Da Sou Desu yo?
Sounds Like We`re Doing All Sorts of Stuff in the Bath Together?
お風呂であんなコトやこんなコトだそうですよ?
